title: Chunky potato salad
ingredients: ['2.25kg whole maris piper potatoes', '5 eggs', '350ml mayonnaise', '2 tablespoons English mustard', '1 small onion, chopped', '3 sticks celery, chopped', '7 sweet gherkins, chopped', '25 pimento-stuffed green olives, sliced', '1 pinch salt to taste', '1 green pepper, sliced (optional)']
